resume.title: Chief Information Technology Officer

resume.title: Application Developer

resume.title: Freelance Fullstack Developer

Utilized WordPress as content management system and built custom queries to dynamically display data

resume.title: Software Engineer

resume.title: Front End Developer

Student Orientation Leader: Directed groups of 25 - 75+ guests throughout campus and provided insight to questions or concerns
